caption: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines attributes and includes references to the classes and objects in which they are used.
name: dictionary

a2a_capabilities.caption: Capabilities
a2a_capabilities.description: List of capabilities supported by the agent for A2A communication.

push_notifications.caption: Push Notifications
push_notifications.description: Indicates whether the agent supports push notifications for A2A communication.

streaming.caption: Streaming
streaming.description: Indicates whether the agent supports streaming for A2A communication.

state_transition_history.caption: State Transition History
state_transition_history.description: Indicates whether the agent supports state transition history for A2A communication.

a2a_card_data.caption: A2A Agent Card Data
a2a_card_data.description: Content of the A2A card in JSON format.

a2a_data.caption: A2A Data
a2a_data.description: Data supported by the agent for A2A.

a2a_protocol_version.caption: Protocol Version
a2a_protocol_version.description: Version of the A2A protocol used by the agent.

a2a_supported_transports.caption: Preferred Transport
a2a_supported_transports.description: Preferred transport protocol for A2A communication.

jsonrpc.caption: JSONRPC
jsonrpc.description: JSON-RPC transport protocol for A2A communication.

grpc.caption: GRPC
grpc.description: gRPC transport protocol for A2A communication.

http.caption: HTTP+JS
http.description: HTTP transport protocol for A2A communication.

a2a_input_modes.caption: Supported Input Modes
a2a_input_modes.description: Supported input modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

a2a_output_modes.caption: Supported Output Modes
a2a_output_modes.description: Supported output modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

security_schemes.caption: Supported Security Schemes
security_schemes.description: Supported security schemes for A2A communication.

oauth2.caption: OAuth2
oauth2.description: OAuth2 security scheme for A2A communication.

api_key.caption: API Key
api_key.description: API Key security scheme for A2A communication.

http.caption: HTTP Basic
http.description: HTTP Basic security scheme for A2A communication.

openid.caption: OpenID Connect
openid.description: OpenID Connect security scheme for A2A communication.

mtls.caption: Mutual TLS
mtls.description: Mutual TLS security scheme for A2A communication.
